summary: Enhance gameplay with this lore addon!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][u]Description

[/u][/size]Have you ever wondered at what it is like to be a member of the most prestigious of lore place in all of dreamsleeve? Have you ever wondered what it is like to reject Talos and embrace Dwemerism? Have you ever wondered about the incestuous relationship between a mining bot posing as a queen and a prince that actually deep down is an ogrim? Have you dreamed of abandoning your casu-el side and step into the [b]mantle[/b] of a loremaster? Have you ever wanted to know the deep lore of CHIM and dragonbreak? Have you ever wanted to ponder the shitty nature of orcs? Have you always wanted to ignore bretons because they suck? Well, look no further.

[b]I present to you, Immersive Lore Enhanced![/b]


[size=3]
[u]What does this mod do?[/u][/size]

Here is a list of its features:

Automatically produces sload gas

Annihilate all avain creatures, including cliff racers

Detecting hidden none-dwemerism believers

Produces musical Khajiits related to footwears

Boink every single female character in the game

Shouts "Go Fuck Yourself" 3 times

Produces an array of doge memes

Might conquer and occupy the lands of Tamriel

Cuddle with cute Thalmors

Loving the one true Vehk

Summoning a flame and frost atronach to ward your belongings

Allowing one to use the line as a transport tool or a sex partner

Makes Vivec rage all 36 times

Cook the user a cyan-colored pastry

Copulate with casual gamers

Produce an excessive amount of bee sounds

Could potentially cause one to have the impulsive need to draw, others might describe you as a lunatic after seeing your work

Causes a random dude to mantle a dyslexic Dagoth Ur

[b][size=5][u]FAQ[/u][/size][/b]

Q:What is lore?
A:Anything, thanks to c0da.


Q:How do I learn about lore?
A:By being a lore.


Q:Is there a summary of all The Elder Scrolls lore?
A:Yes.



[size=5][u]Installation:

[/u][/size]Anything but putting muatra in the vicinity of a moving object
author: zbzszzzt123
